isis.stitle: Tire Pressure Monitoring System (Feature Code 16VCM) - Feature Functions - Tire Temperature Diagnostics

svcprocinfo.para: The system also alerts the operator on the VID and sets a corresponding DTC if an over temperature condition exists, as described below.

svcsubproc.title: High Temperature Diagnostic Mode
svcsubproc.para: The tire sensor goes into 'over temperature mode' if the following conditions are true:

item.para: The temperature measured by the tire sensor is greater than 248F (120C).

svcsubproc.para: The following will occur while the tire sensor is in the 'over temperature mode':

item.para: The tire sensor will stop transmitting data.
AND the corresponding tire will be displayed in RED on the VID.
AND the tire pressure monitoring controller will set a 'Temperature cut-out' DTC.

svcsubproc.para: The tire sensor goes back to "normal mode" (transmitting data once every minute) after the temperature becomes less than or equal to 212F (100C).
